aws_route_table.description: Provides a resource to create a VPC routing table.

route.description: A list of route objects. Their keys are documented below. This argument is processed in [attribute-as-blocks mode](/docs/configuration/attr-as-blocks.html).

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

propagating_vgws.description: A list of virtual gateways for propagation.

id.description: The ID of the routing table.

owner_id.description: The ID of the AWS account that owns the route table.
